name: AIA_RULE_NormalizeStringHelperRegex
sail_code:
a!map(
  text: 
  /*First we verify if the abbreviation has an end point because this can cause errors so we need to take 
two cases when it has the point at the end and when not*/
  if(
    regexmatch(
      pattern: "\.\s*$",
      searchString:ri!abb
    ),
    regexreplaceall(
      concat(
        "\b",
        regexreplaceall(
          pattern:"\.\s*$",
          searchString: ri!abb,
          replacementString: ""
        ),
        "\.(?!\w)"
      ),
      ri!data.text,
      ri!data.key

    ),

    regexreplaceall(
      concat(
        "\b",
        ri!abb,
        "\b(?!\.)"
      ),
      ri!data.text,
      ri!data.key
    )
  ),
  key: ri!data.key
),
